code: import alertActions from"../actions/alertActions";const initState={showAlertMessage:false,alertMessageContent:null};const reducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case alertActions.OPEN_ALERT_MESSAGE:return{...state,showAlertMessage:true,alertMessageContent:action.content};case alertActions.CLOSE_ALERT_MESSAGE:return{...state,showAlertMessage:false,alertMessageContent:null};default:return state;}};export default reducer;
